results.response_text:
═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
CITATION #1
═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════

ORIGINAL:
_King James Bible_ (2017) King James Bible Online. https://www.kingjamesbibleonline.org/ (Original work published: 1769)

SOURCE TYPE: Online sacred text/classic work

VALIDATION RESULTS:
❌ Title: A period is missing after the italicized title.
   Should be: _King James Bible_.
❌ Date: A period should follow the closing parenthesis of the year.
   Should be: (2017).
❌ Original work published date: The colon after "published" should be omitted.
   Should be: (Original work published 1769).

───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
CITATION #2
═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════

ORIGINAL:
Malory, T. (2017). _Le morte d'Arthur_ (P. J. C. Field, Ed.). D. S. Brewer.

SOURCE TYPE: Edited book

VALIDATION RESULTS:
✓ No APA 7 formatting errors detected

───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
CITATION #3
═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════

ORIGINAL:
Leitch, M. G., & Rushton, C. J. (Eds.). 2019. _A New Companion to Malory_. D. S. Brewer.

SOURCE TYPE: Edited book

VALIDATION RESULTS:
❌ Year: The year should be enclosed in parentheses and placed immediately after the editors, followed by a period.
   Should be: Leitch, M. G., & Rushton, C. J. (Eds.). (2019).

───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
CITATION #4
═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════

ORIGINAL:
I. O. for Standardization. (2018). _Occupational health and safety management systems—Requirements with guidance for use_ (ISO Standard No. 45001:2018). https://www.iso.org/standard/63787.html

SOURCE TYPE: Standard

VALIDATION RESULTS:
❌ Author/Organization: "I. O. for Standardization" is not the correct APA 7th edition name for the organization. It should be spelled out as "International Organization for Standardization" or use the widely recognized abbreviation "ISO" if that is how the organization refers to itself in general use as the author.
   Should be: International Organization for Standardization. (2018). OR ISO. (2018).

───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
CITATION #5
═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════

SOURCE TYPE: Book with an illustrator

VALIDATION RESULTS:
✓ No APA 7 formatting errors detected

───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
